issue.title: [CI] C/glib build broken on OS X
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3100](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3100). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Travis-CI build fails to find luarocks:
https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/418753219#L2657

```Java

+sudo env PKG_CONFIG_PATH=:/usr/local/opt/libffi/lib/pkgconfig luarocks install lgi
env: luarocks: No such file or directory

The command "$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/ci/travis_before_script_c_glib.sh" failed and exited with 127 during .
```
